description: This file defines React functional components 'AuthGuard' and 'RoleGuard' used for route protection based on authentication and user roles in a React application. It handles loading states, user authentication checks, and role-based access control, utilizing React Router's navigation components and a custom authentication context.

methods.name: AuthGuard({ children })
methods.description: React component that protects routes by requiring an authenticated user. Redirects to signin page if user is not authenticated, shows loading indicator if auth state is loading.

methods.name: RoleGuard({ roles = [], fallback = '/learn', children })
methods.description: React component that protects routes based on user roles. Redirects to signin if not authenticated, or to a fallback route if roles are insufficient, showing loading indicator if auth state is loading.
